title: AssignmentAttemptResponse
description: A response to an assignment attempt request

traceId.description: The same traceId as contained in the assignment attempt request

eventTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when Ruter has processed the message

result.description: Result and specifications of the processes attempt request

state.description: Assignment state as a result of the processed attempt. If the processed attempt did not change the state of the Assignment, this section removed from the response
